original_text: When Moses lifted up his hands, the Israelites were winning in the fight. But when Moses brought his hands down, the Amalekites were winning.
korean_text: 모세가 손을 들면 이스라엘이 이기고 손을 내리면 아말렉이 이기더니

sentences.original_text: When Moses lifted up his hands
the Israelites were winning in the fight
But when Moses brought his hands down
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 모세가 그의 손을 내렸을 때
